en.title: Ansible – Lesson 3: Installation & Setup
en.subtitle: Installing Ansible on Linux, setting up SSH, Windows support and verification

sections.heading: 1. Prerequisites for Ansible
sections.content: To install Ansible, you need a Linux system as a control node, Python installed and SSH access to target servers.

sections.heading: 2. Installing Ansible on Ubuntu
sections.content: Run: sudo apt update && sudo apt install ansible -y

sections.heading: 3. Installing Ansible on CentOS / RHEL
sections.content: Run: sudo yum install epel-release -y && sudo yum install ansible -y

sections.heading: 4. Verify Ansible Installation
sections.content: Use the command: ansible --version to verify installation.

sections.heading: 5. Control Node Requirement
sections.content: Ansible control node must be Linux. Windows cannot be a control node.

sections.heading: 6. Windows as Managed Node
sections.content: Windows machines can be managed using WinRM instead of SSH.

sections.heading: 7. Setting up SSH Key-based Authentication
sections.content: Generate SSH keys using ssh-keygen and copy them to managed nodes using ssh-copy-id.

sections.heading: 8. Testing SSH Connectivity
sections.content: Test connection using: ssh user@server_ip

sections.heading: 9. Passwordless Authentication
sections.content: Ansible works best with passwordless SSH authentication for automation.

sections.heading: 10. Ansible Configuration File (ansible.cfg)
sections.content: The ansible.cfg file is used to configure Ansible settings such as inventory path and default user.

sections.heading: 11. Default Paths in Ansible
sections.content: Inventory file default path is /etc/ansible/hosts and config file path is /etc/ansible/ansible.cfg.

sections.heading: Lesson 3 Summary
sections.content: You learned how to install Ansible on Linux, configure SSH, verify setup and understand Windows support.

ta.title: Ansible – பாடம் 3: Installation & Setup
ta.subtitle: Linux-லில் Ansible நிறுவல், SSH அமைப்பு, Windows support மற்றும் verification

sections.heading: 1. Ansible-க்கு தேவையானவை
sections.content: Control node Linux ஆக இருக்க வேண்டும், Python மற்றும் SSH access தேவை.

sections.heading: 2. Ubuntu-வில் Ansible நிறுவுதல்
sections.content: Command: sudo apt update && sudo apt install ansible -y

sections.heading: 3. CentOS / RHEL-ல் நிறுவுதல்
sections.content: Command: sudo yum install epel-release -y && sudo yum install ansible -y

sections.heading: 4. Ansible Installation Verify செய்வது
sections.content: ansible --version என்ற command பயன்படுத்தி verify செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 5. Control Node Requirement
sections.content: Control node கட்டாயம் Linux ஆக இருக்க வேண்டும்.

sections.heading: 6. Windows Managed Node
sections.content: Windows machines-ஐ WinRM மூலம் manage செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 7. SSH Key-based Authentication அமைத்தல்
sections.content: ssh-keygen மற்றும் ssh-copy-id மூலம் SSH authentication அமைக்கலாம்.

sections.heading: 8. SSH Connection Test செய்வது
sections.content: ssh user@server_ip என்ற command மூலம் test செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 9. Passwordless Authentication
sections.content: Automation-க்கு password வேண்டாத SSH authentication சிறந்தது.

sections.heading: 10. Ansible Configuration File
sections.content: ansible.cfg file மூலம் Ansible full configuration செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 11. Default File Paths
sections.content: Inventory: /etc/ansible/hosts, Config: /etc/ansible/ansible.cfg

sections.heading: Lesson 3 Summary
sections.content: Ansible install, SSH setup மற்றும் Windows support பற்றி கற்றுக்கொண்டீர்கள்.
